Extracted Variables:
- x: number of large pills
- y: number of small pills

Extracted Constraints:
- Medicinal Ingredients: 3x + 2y \leq 1000
- Filler Material: 2x + y \leq 1000
- Minimum Large Pills: x \geq 100
- Minimum Small Pills: y \geq 0.6(x + y)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize filler material: minimize 2x + y
